atomica.objects
Class GameSettings

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      atomica.objects.GameSettings
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultGameSettings, EditorGameSettings
public abstract class GameSettings
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

Abstract class holding all necessary settings for the initialization of a game situation. This includes the board size, the levels and a base factor for score calculation. Since it can be defined in two modes - by the game settings itself or by the editor there are two subclasses: EditorGameSettings and DefaultGameSettings. The main difference consists in their initialization.

Author:
Georg Ludewig
